label: InformationSource
comment: A person, organization, thing or place from which information comes, arises or is obtained.

objectProperties.comment: The code specifying the category of this specified information source.
Content, expressed as text, of this specified information source.
A textual description of this specified information source.
A name, expressed as text, of this specified information source.
Security information, expressed as text, of this specified information source.
The identifier of the website URI (Uniform Resource Identifier) of this specified information source.

referencedBy.comment: A cooperative information source specified for this trade party.
A specified cooperative information source used for or from this cooperating organization.
